title: Coast to Coast Radio Program! Commercial Free! Apr 17th thru Apr
description:
Expanding the Consciousness of the entire planet! Coast to Coast with George Noory. Thanks in advance to all the seeders and leechers. It&#039;s awesome to share the last ten broadcasts with numerous others around the globe. Do me a favor and upload these to as many sites as you all can and continue to seed as long as you can. Thank You All! Until next week my friends! Stokeman Out.....

Thursday April 17th, 2008
The Nye Incidents
Authors Whitley Strieber and Craig Spector discussed their new graphic novel The Nye Incidents which concerns mysterious cases of human mutilation, which may be connected to alien abductions. The incidents in the book were inspired by a number of real... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Whitley Strieber, Craig Spector, Henry T. Greely, John Gray, Dr. Roger Leir

Friday April 18th, 2008
The Legend of J.C. Brown
In the first hour, writer Stephen Sindoni discussed the legend of J.C. Brown, a man who supposedly worked as a geologist for the Lord Cowdray Mining Co. in the early 20th century and claimed to have discovered an ancient Lemurian civilization in the hollows... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Open Lines, Stephen Sindoni

Saturday April 19th, 2008
Survivalism & Roget&#039;s Thesaurus
Ian Punnett and Steve Quayle held a lively and spirited discussion on the topic of "survivalism." Callers phoned in to speak with Quayle during the last half of the show. In the first hour, author Joshua Kendall (Book Link) spoke about Roget&#039;s Thesaurus... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Steve Quayle, Joshua Kendall

Sunday April 20th, 2008
A Polygamist&#039;s Wife
Irene Spencer, a fifth generation polygamist, shared her account of being the second of ten wives and the mother of 14 of her husband&#039;s 58 children. She eventually escaped from her polygamist community, which practiced a fundamentalist offshoot of Mormonism.... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Irene Spencer

Monday April 21st, 2008
Biblical Prophecy in 2008
Rev. Irvin Baxter discussed how 2008 could be the year of greatest fulfillment in biblical prophecy in the last 2,000 years. He outlined four prophesied events that may come to pass this year. The Mark of the Beast, in which everyone will need to have...
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Irvin Baxter, Dr. Allan J. Hamilton

Tuesday April 22nd, 2008
Hudson Valley UFOs & the Paranormal
UFO investigator for over thirty years, Philip Imbrogno discussed the Hudson Valley sightings of the 1980s, as well as hidden connections between UFOs and other unexplained phenomena. Working with the renowned J. Allen Hynek, he investigated the Hudson... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Philip Imbrogno, Stanton Friedman

Wednesday April 23rd, 2008
Scientific Creativity
Author Clifford Pickover discussed his latest work on scientific laws and the great minds behind them, and also touched on such topics as time travel, parallel universes and alien life. Some of the best scientific laws have the widest applications, he... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Clifford Pickover, Lynne D. Kitei

Thursday April 24th, 2008
Honey Bees, Ethanol, Morgellons & Strange Lights
Investigative reporter Linda Moulton Howe updated several on-going stories including Honey Bee collapse, grain shortages, Morgellons disease, and strange aerial lights. According to one beekeeper, Honey Bee collapse is worse this year than it was last... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Linda Moulton Howe, Phil Plait, Michael Cremo

Friday April 25th, 2008
Smiley Face Killers
During the first half of the program, Kristi Piehl, award-winning journalist for KSTP Channel 5 Eyewitness News in Minneapolis, shared details from her investigation into the murder of a University of Minnesota student and how it could be linked to the... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Kristi Piehl, Open Lines

Saturday April 26th, 2008
Suspicious Drug Studies
Dr. John Abramson discussed the breaking scandal of ghostwritten drug trials which puts the actual efficacy of many new drugs into question. He also talked about other ethical issues surrounding the pharmaceutical industry, such as the medication of...
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Dr. John Abramson
